name: Shrink Me
description:
Blue zones expand you and red zones make you shrink when you press ENTER. When expanded, you are less likely to fall into holes. Crystals can be used to shrink by pressing Q. Use WASD to move and space bar to jump. You cannot jump on the red/blue zones! Be careful, when you reach a size of 20 you'll explode! 

Try to reach 1! ;D

Special thanks to my friends Antonio, Bernard, Shawn and Wen Chuan for helping me with the idea! 

It's my first game, all constructive feedback welcome! Also, this is a submission for Blackthornprod's 3rd game jam!
